abstract: While President Obama may not have an official favorite banker, members of his administration continue to sing the praises of Bank of America’s chief.
snippet: While President Obama may not have an official favorite banker, members of his administration continue to sing the praises of Bank of America’s chief.
lead_paragraph: From a Q. & A. session between The Charlotte Observer and Michael S. Barr, an assistant Treasury secretary:

headline.main: White House Praise for Moynihan Continues
